DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy FTY720 combine cyclosporine corticosteroid patient receive kidney transplant .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety FTY720 de Novo Adult Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients complete 12 Month visit Core trial either study drug . Female capable become pregnant require medically approve method birth control 3 Month study medication stop . Exclusion Criteria None
